attributes.action: Asylum in the UK for white South Africans in peril
attributes.additional_details: White South African farmers are currently under racially-motivated attack by gangs of black South Africans.  These murders often involve rape and torture of the victims, who are mainly the elderly, women and children.  Genocide Watch have currently placed SA on level 6 on a scale of 1-8 (8 being the worst).  However, white South Africans believe that Europe and America will not grant them asylum.  Please prove them wrong by offering them asylum. http://www.genocidewatch.org/southafrica.html
